_comment: For more information about the format of this file, see README.md in the autochecklist package.
name: mcr_teardown

subtasks.name: stop_broadcast
subtasks.description: If you have not already done so, stop the broadcast on BoxCast and then in vMix.

subtasks.name: update_video_computer
subtasks.description: Check for updates on the MCR video computer.

subtasks.name: update_sound_computer
subtasks.description: Check for updates on the MCR sound computer.

subtasks.name: update_kids_laptop
subtasks.description: Bring back the Kids Connection laptop and charger from the Annex and check for updates.

subtasks.name: update_teleprompter_laptop
subtasks.description: Bring back the teleprompter laptop and check for updates.

subtasks.name: wait_for_BoxCast_recording
subtasks.description: Wait until the BoxCast recording is available.

subtasks.name: create_rebroadcast_1pm
subtasks.description: On BoxCast, create a rebroadcast titled '%{boxcast.rebroadcast_title}%' at 1:00 pm. See https://github.com/recc-tech/tech/wiki/Creating-Rebroadcasts-on-BoxCast for details.

subtasks.name: create_rebroadcast_5pm
subtasks.description: On BoxCast, create a rebroadcast titled '%{boxcast.rebroadcast_title}%' at 5:00 pm. See https://github.com/recc-tech/tech/wiki/Creating-Rebroadcasts-on-BoxCast for details.

subtasks.name: create_rebroadcast_7pm
subtasks.description: On BoxCast, create a rebroadcast titled '%{boxcast.rebroadcast_title}%' at 7:00 pm. See https://github.com/recc-tech/tech/wiki/Creating-Rebroadcasts-on-BoxCast for details.

subtasks.name: export_to_Vimeo
subtasks.description: On BoxCast, export the recording to Vimeo. On the live event page, go to Download or Export Recording > Vimeo.

subtasks.name: copy_Vimeo_URL_to_COP
subtasks.description: Take the link to today's Vimeo video and copy it to Church Online Platform. To find the URL, go to https://vimeo.com/manage/videos, locate today's video, and click 'Copy link.' Then, on Church Online Platform, go to the Admin view, go to Setup, and paste the link.

subtasks.name: create_video_markers
subtasks.description: On BoxCast, create video markers. See https://github.com/recc-tech/tech/wiki/Video-Markers for the list of chapters.

subtasks.name: review_and_publish_captions
subtasks.description: ***IMPORTANT*** Publish BEFORE leaving the page, otherwise your changes will be lost. ***IMPORTANT*** On BoxCast, review low-confidence cues and publish the captions, but don't download them yet.

subtasks.name: download_captions
subtasks.description: On BoxCast, download the captions and save them in %{captions.original}%.

subtasks.name: copy_captions_to_final
subtasks.description: Copy %{captions.original}% to %{captions.final}%.

subtasks.name: remove_worship_captions
subtasks.description: In %{captions.final}%, remove the worship captions.

subtasks.name: upload_captions_to_BoxCast
subtasks.description: On BoxCast, upload the captions.

subtasks.name: disable_automatic_captions
subtasks.description: On Vimeo, disable the autogenerated captions for today's video.
subtasks._comment: Put this task as late as possible so Vimeo has a chance to post the autogenerated captions.

subtasks.name: upload_captions_to_Vimeo
subtasks.description: On Vimeo, upload the captions and make sure they are enabled.

subtasks.name: close_vMix
subtasks.description: Save this week's preset and close vMix.

subtasks.name: turn_off_monitors
subtasks.description: Turn off both TV monitors in the MCR.

subtasks.name: turn_off_NDI_controller
subtasks.description: Turn off the NDI controller.

subtasks.name: turn_off_cams
subtasks.description: Turn off camera 4 (the camera on the tripod).

subtasks.name: check_GitHub_checklist
subtasks.description: Double-check that all tasks (especially automatic ones) have been completed properly using the checklist on GitHub: https://github.com/recc-tech/tech/issues.
